text: @piersmorgan Easy enough to explain - it's a legal cull. Hitler said that the bigger lie, the more likely it is to be believed. Likewise, the awful truth just can't be grasped by a gullible public. No more need for Liverpool Care Pathway, patients under windy air vents, DNR etc #coronavirus
